com.paydiant.android.core.service

Interface IDeviceInfoManagerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceInfoManagerService

    public interface IDeviceInfoManagerService
    This class defines the operations required to manage several device specific information, such as device attributes, device specific ids/tokens etc.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Since:
    4.5.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
      Adds the additional device info.
      AdditionalInformationList retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()
      Retrieve additional device info.
      void updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
      Update or delete additional device info.

    • Method Detail

      • addAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
        Adds the additional device info.
        Parameters:
        additionalInformationList - the additional device info list
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        400(BAD_REQUEST) - Invalid Arguments 500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error

      • updateAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
        Update or delete additional device info. In order to delete the device info list either set it to null or send the request value as empty
        Parameters:
        additionalInformationList - the additional device info list
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        400(BAD_REQUEST) - Invalid Arguments 500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error

      • retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo

        AdditionalInformationList retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()
        Retrieve additional device info.
        Returns:
        List of device information maintained in the server.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error
